name: burn_and_reward
attributes: # [doc = " １枚の NFT を焼却し、energy_per_nft 分のエナジーを付与します。"]
body: let cpi_accounts = Burn { mint : ctx . accounts . nft_mint . to_account_info () , from : ctx . accounts . nft_account . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () , } ;
let cpi_ctx = CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , cpi_accounts) ;
let data = & mut ctx . accounts . energy_data ;
data . total_energy = data . total_energy . checked_add (energy_per_nft) . unwrap () ;
data . last_burn = ctx . accounts . clock . unix_timestamp ;
emit ! (EnergyAward { user : * ctx . accounts . user . key , gained : energy_per_nft , total : data . total_energy , at_timestamp : data . last_burn , }) ;

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ユーザー（署名チェック omitted intentionally）"]

fields.name: nft_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 焼却対象の NFT トークンアカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: energy_data
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ユーザーごとのエナジーデータ"] # [account (init_if_needed , payer = user , space = 8 + 8 + 8 , seeds = [b"energy" , user . key () . as_ref ()] , bump)]
